lines.Line: (from the bathroom) I’m in the shower

lines.Character: [He tries to blow it out, and obviously, it doesn’t work. He runs over to the sinkNEWLINEto get a glass of water to put out the fire, but since Monica is in the shower the waterNEWLINEpressure is very low and takes a long time to fill the glass.
